message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly useful for someone in your position, and I'm confident it would be a valuable asset. I'm asking for $13,000 for it. What do you think?
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than what I'm hoping for.  Could you meet me halfway at $11,500?
I understand Alice, but I'm still not able to go above $10,000 for this product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
